Description: Part of a bracelet of grey metasediment: amounting to just under half the original circumference. The outer edge is rounded and the inner surface is flat, producing a semicircular section.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: B. Porter & R. Moss, 'Topographical Bibliography of Ancient Egyptian Hieroglyphic Texts, Reliefs and Paintings' V (Oxford: Clarendon Press), 81; W. M. F. Petrie, 'Royal Tombs of the Earliest Dynasties' II (London, 1901)pl. XLV, 17.
Bibliographic references: Andrews 1981 / Catalogue of Egyptian Antiquities. Jewellery I (169)
